nodes.text: Elarec Yovet was a Togruta female queen who served as the Regasa of Shili during the High Republic Era. Regasa Yovet additionally had the titles of Supreme Huntress of the United Tribes and Ruler of Togrutas. As a gesture of friendship, she was invited to the Republic Fair on Valo by Supreme Chancellor Lina Soh, who hoped to build stronger bonds between the Togrutas and the Galactic Republic. Yovet was also a longtime friend of the Jedi Master Jora Malli.
